page.title: 17ASLACKBY-EVENTS
page.content: {LOCAL EVENTS Aslackby is a classic example of a village which pulls together to get things done. It is an extremely friendly village too and many people will go out of their way to keep everything looking neat and tidy. Every year, there is a summer fete with all stalls made by the people of the village. Vast amounts of money are raised for the church. As much as Â£1000 a year,which is very good for a village of its size. The church holds a Harvest Festival which is always well attended, despite the village not having its own vicar. The village always enters the Best Kept Village competion. There is also a Village Hall Quiz to help maintain the village halls of the area, and also, to simply keep them in use.
